ROW.DATDSC: select a.id, a.title 标题, c.name 创建人, to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') 创建时间, e.name 事务类型, p.name 项目名称, ss.name 状态, pp.name 优先级, cc.name 最后处理人, a.guid from trkhdr a,v_usr c ,trktyp e,v_usr cc,v_prj p, v_PRIO pp , v_trkstat ss where a.SELFORG=c.orgid and a.crtusr=c.id and a.AIMORG=cc.orgid and a.dtlusr=cc.id and a.PRIO = pp.id and a.stat=ss.id and cc.id=lower('[%SYS_USRID]') and cc.orgid='[%SYS_ORGID]' and a.project =p.id and a.show =e.id and a.stat like '[%trkstat]%' and e.id not in ('4','5','6','7','8','9','10','16','17') and a.prio like '[%PRIO]%' and a.PROJECT like '[%prj]%' and a.crtusr like '[%create]%' and a.title like '%[%title]%' and e.id like '[%trktyp]%' order by to_char(a.crtdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') desc
